title: Alphabets
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Writing Systems](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Writing%20Systems) : Alphabets**

Abur, see [Old Permic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Permic)  
Arabic  
Archaic Latin, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
Adriatic, Middle, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
 [Armenian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Armenian)  
 [Avestan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Avestan)  
 [Bassa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bassa) ( [Vah](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Vah))  
 [Beitha Kukju](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Beitha%20Kukju)  
 [Braille](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Braille)  
 [Coptic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Coptic)  
 [Cyrillic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cyrillic) (Post-Petrine Cyrillic)  
 [Deseret Alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Deseret%20Alphabet)  
 [Elbasan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Elbasan)  
 [Etruscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Etruscan)  
Faliscan, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
 [Fraser](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fraser)  
Futhark, see [Runic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Runic)  
 [Georgian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Georgian)  
 [Glagolitic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Glagolitic)  
 [Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gothic)  
 [Greek](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Greek)  
 [Hangul](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hangul) ( [Korean](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Korean))  
 [Hungarian Runes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hungarian%20Runes)  
 [International Phonetic Alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/International%20Phonetic%20Alphabet) ( [IPA](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/IPA))  
 [Klingon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klingon)  
Korean, see [Hangul](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hangul)  
 [Latin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Latin) ( [Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Roman))  
Latin, Archaic, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
 [Manchu](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Manchu)  
Marsiliana, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
Messapic, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
Middle Adriatic, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
 [Mongolian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mongolian)  
 [N'Ko](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/N%27Ko)  
North Picene, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
 [Old Church Slavonic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Church%20Slavonic) (Pre-Petrine Cyrillic)  
 [Ogham](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ogham)  
Ol Cemet', see [Santali](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Santali)  
 [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic) ( [Archaic Latin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Archaic%20Latin), [Faliscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Faliscan), [Marsiliana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Marsiliana), [Messapic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Messapic), [Oscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Oscan), [North Picene](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/North%20Picene), [South Picene](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/South%20Picene) ( [Middle Adriatic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Middle%20Adriatic)), [Umbrian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Umbrian))  
 [Old Permic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Permic) ( [Abur](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Abur))  
 [Orkhon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Orkhon) ( [Turkic Runes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Turkic%20Runes))  
Oscan, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
Osmanya, see [Somali](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Somali)  
Picene, North and South, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
 [Pollard Miao](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pollard%20Miao)  
Roman, see [Latin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Latin)  
 [Runic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Runic) ( [Futhark](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Futhark))  
 [Santali](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Santali) ( [Ol Cemet'](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ol%20Cemet%27))  
 [Shavian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Shavian)  
 [Somali](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Somali) ( [Osmanya](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Osmanya))  
South Picene, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
 [Sutton SignWriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sutton%20SignWriting)  
 [Tai Lue](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tai%20Lue)  
 [Tengwar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tengwar)  
 [Thaana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thaana)  
Turkic Runes, see [Orkhon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Orkhon)  
Umbrian, see [Old Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Old%20Italic)  
Vah, see [Bassa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bassa)
